author: Hiew Chok Sien
content: Ha ha... funny that I'm reading this article while using the Streamyx internet connection in my father's house in Sabah. I think Unifi came to Sabah about 1.5 to 2 years ago, but my father has been asking TM and TM has been telling him sorry uncle not yet at your taman. But recently my father's neighbour got Unifi installed, so he should be getting his soon.
